questions.title: Is general relativity the answer?
questions.author: Albert Einstein
questions.notes: General relativity (GR, also known as the general theory of relativity or GTR) is the geometric theory of gravitation published by Albert Einstein in 1915 and the current description of gravitation in modern physics
